articles.content:

articles.title: "Horrendously Wrong": 134 Ex-Bureaucrats On Bilkis Bano Convicts' Release
articles.description: More than 130 former civil servants on Saturday wrote an open letter to the Chief Justice of India (CJI) against the premature release of 11 men who were jailed in the gangrape case of Bilkis Bano.
articles.content:
The ex-civil servants said release of Bilkis Bano convicts has "outraged the nation".(FILE)
